greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of q^(-1) * c(q^2) * (c(q) - c(q^4)) / 9 in powers of q^2 where c() is a cubic AGM theta function.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of phi(-x^3)^4 / (chi(-x) * chi(-x^3))^3 in powers of x where phi(), chi() are Ramanujan theta functions.
a(n) = b(2*n + 1) where b(n) is multiplicative with b(2^e) = 0^e, b(3^e) = 3^e, b(p^e) = (p^(e+1) - 1) / (p - 1) if p>3.
G.f. is a period 1 Fourier series which satisfies f(-1 / (12 t)) = 2 (t/i)^2 g(t) where q = exp(2 Pi i t) and g() is g.f. for A118271.
mathematica: A185717[n_] := SeriesCoefficient[(QPochhammer[q^3, q^3]/QPochhammer[-q^3, q^3])^4*(1/(QPochhammer[q, q^2]*QPochhammer[q^3, q^6])^3), {q, 0, n}];
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, n = 2*n + 1; sumdiv( n, d, if( (n/d) % 3, 1, 0) * d))}
(PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^2 + A)^3 * eta(x^3 + A)^5 / (eta(x + A)^3 * eta(x^6 + A)), n))}
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Feb 10 2011
